attributes.action: Stop Adam Crozier walking away from Royal Mail with more than £2000000.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe it is totally wrong to allow Mr Crozier to walk away from RM with £2000000+, particuarly at a time when the pension fund is in dire straights and thousands of Postal Workers are potentially going to lose their jobs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
